metadata.name: validator_bonds
metadata.description: Marinade validator bonds program protecting validators performance

accounts.name: settlement
docs: settlement to close whenever the operator decides

accounts.name: authority
docs: Cancelling is permitted only to emergency or operator authority

accounts.name: split_rent_refund_account
docs: The stake account is funded to the settlement and credited to the bond's validator vote account.
The lamports are utilized to pay back the rent exemption of the split_stake_account

accounts.name: authority
docs: validator vote account validator identity or bond authority may ask for cancelling

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the settlement was created

accounts.name: settlement_claims
docs: deduplication, merkle tree record cannot be claimed twice

accounts.name: stake_account_from
docs: a stake account that will be withdrawn

accounts.name: stake_account_to
docs: a stake account that will receive the funds

accounts.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority
docs: authority that manages (owns == by being withdrawer authority) all stakes account under the bonds program

accounts.name: config
docs: the config root configuration account

accounts.name: authority
docs: validator vote account node identity or bond authority may claim

accounts.name: stake_account
docs: stake account to be used to withdraw the funds
this stake account has to be delegated to the validator vote account associated to the bond

accounts.name: withdrawer
docs: New owner of the stake account, it will be accounted to the withdrawer authority

accounts.name: split_stake_account
docs: this is a whatever address that does not exist
when withdrawing needs to split the provided account this will be used as a new stake account

accounts.name: split_stake_rent_payer
docs: when the split_stake_account is created the rent for creation is taken from here
when the split_stake_account is not created then no rent is paid

accounts.name: settlement
docs: settlement to close when expired

accounts.name: split_rent_refund_account
docs: The stake account is funded to the settlement and credited to the bond's validator vote account.
The lamports are utilized to pay back the rent exemption of the split_stake_account, which can be created upon funding the settlement.

accounts.name: authority
docs: validator vote account validator identity or bond authority may change the account

accounts.name: token_account
docs: token account to burn bond mint configuration tokens from

accounts.name: admin_authority
docs: only the admin authority can change the config params

accounts.name: bond
docs: bond account to be deposited to with the provided stake account

accounts.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority
docs: new owner of the stake_account, it's the bonds withdrawer authority

accounts.name: stake_account
docs: stake account to be deposited

accounts.name: stake_authority
docs: authority signature permitting to change the stake_account authorities

accounts.name: operator_authority
docs: operator signer authority is allowed to fund the settlement account

accounts.name: stake_account
docs: stake account to be funded into the settlement

accounts.name: settlement_staker_authority
docs: the settlement stake authority differentiates between deposited and funded stake accounts
deposited accounts have the bonds_withdrawer_authority, while funded accounts have the settlement_staker_authority

accounts.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority
docs: authority that manages (owns) all stakes account under the bonds program

accounts.name: split_stake_account
docs: if an account that does not exist is provided, it will be initialized as a stake account (with the necessary signature)
the split_stake_account is required when the provided stake_account contains more lamports than necessary to fund the settlement
in this case, the excess lamports from the stake account are split into the new split_stake_account,
if the split_stake_account is not needed, the rent payer is refunded back within tx

accounts.name: split_stake_rent_payer
docs: the rent exempt payer of the split_stake_account creation
if the split_stake_account is not needed (no leftover lamports on funding), then the rent payer is refunded
if the split_stake_account is needed to spill out over funding of the settlement,
then the rent payer is refunded when the settlement is closed

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the bond is created

accounts.name: validator_identity
docs: permission-ed: the validator identity signs the instruction, InitBondArgs applied
permission-less: no signature, default init bond configuration

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer of validator bond account creation

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer for the config account

accounts.name: operator_authority
docs: operator signer authority that is allowed to create the settlement account

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer of account creation

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the bond was created

accounts.name: authority
docs: validator vote account node identity or bond authority may ask for the withdrawal

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer of withdraw request account creation

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the bond was created

accounts.name: staker_authority
docs: bonds program authority PDA address: settlement staker or bonds withdrawer

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer of account creation

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the bond was created

accounts.name: settlement
docs: cannot exist; used to derive settlement authority

accounts.name: stake_account
docs: stake account belonging under the settlement by staker authority

accounts.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority
docs: bonds withdrawer authority
to cancel settlement funding of the stake account changing staker authority to address

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: rent exempt payer of account reallocation

accounts.name: config
docs: the config account under which the bond was created

accounts.name: operator_authority
docs: operator authority is allowed to reset the non-delegated stake accounts

accounts.name: settlement
docs: cannot exist; used to derive settlement authority

accounts.name: stake_account
docs: stake account where staker authority is derived from settlement

accounts.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority
docs: bonds authority to withdraw the stake account

types.name: Bond
docs: Bond account for a validator vote address

fields.name: config
docs: Program root config address. Validator bond is created for this config as PDA

fields.name: vote_account
docs: Validator vote address that this bond account is crated for
INVARIANTS:
- one bond account per validator vote address
- this program does NOT change stake account delegation voter_pubkey to any other validator vote account

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that may close the bond or withdraw stake accounts associated with the bond
The same powers has got the owner of the validator vote account

fields.name: cpmpe
docs: Cost per mille per epoch.
This field represents the bid the bond (vote) account owner is willing to pay
for up to the `max_stake_wanted` being delegated.
The bid is in cost per mille per epoch similar to Google ads cpm system.
The actual amount of lamports deducted from the bond account for the processed bid
is based on the actual delegated lamports during the epoch.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA Bond address bump seed

fields.name: max_stake_wanted
docs: Maximum stake (in lamports) that the bond (vote) account owner requests.
This is the maximum stake that will be distributed to the vote account
when all other constraints are fulfilled (managed off-chain).
The vote account owner then goes to auction to obtain up to that maximum.
Use the `cpmpe` field to define the bid for this purpose.

fields.name: reserved
docs: reserve space for future extensions

fields.name: proof
docs: proof that the claim is appropriate

fields.name: stake_account_staker
docs: staker authority of the stake_account_to; merkle root verification

fields.name: stake_account_withdrawer
docs: withdrawer authority of the stake_account_to; merkle root verification

fields.name: claim
docs: claim amount; merkle root verification

fields.name: index
docs: index, ordered claim record in the settlement list; merkle root verification

types.name: Config
docs: Root account that configures the validator bonds program

fields.name: admin_authority
docs: Admin authority that can update the config

fields.name: operator_authority
docs: Operator authority (bot hot wallet)

fields.name: epochs_to_claim_settlement
docs: How many epochs permitting to claim the settlement

fields.name: withdraw_lockup_epochs
docs: How many epochs before withdraw is allowed

fields.name: minimum_stake_lamports
docs: Minimum amount of lamports to be considered for a stake account operations (e.g., split)

fields.name: bonds_withdrawer_authority_bump
docs: PDA bonds stake accounts authority bump seed

fields.name: pause_authority
docs: Authority that can pause the program in case of emergency

fields.name: slots_to_start_settlement_claiming
docs: How many slots to wait before settlement is permitted to be claimed

fields.name: min_bond_max_stake_wanted
docs: Minimum value of max_stake_wanted to be configured by vote account owners at bond.

fields.name: reserved
docs: reserved space for future changes

fields.name: bond_authority
docs: New bond authority that can manage the bond account.

fields.name: cpmpe
docs: New `cpmpe` value (cost per mille per epoch).
It defines the bid for the validator to get delegated up to `max_stake_wanted` lamports.

fields.name: max_stake_wanted
docs: New `max_stake_wanted` value that the vote account owner declares
as the maximum delegated stake desired.

fields.name: validator_identity
docs: Validator identity configured within the vote account.

fields.name: bond_authority
docs: New bond authority that can manage the bond account.

fields.name: cpmpe
docs: New `cpmpe` value (cost per mille per epoch).
It defines the bid for the validator to get delegated up to `max_stake_wanted` lamports.

fields.name: max_stake_wanted
docs: new max_stake_wanted value that vote account owner declares
as the maximum delegated stake wanted

fields.name: voter_pubkey
docs: to whom the stake is delegated

fields.name: stake
docs: activated stake amount, set at delegate() time

fields.name: activation_epoch
docs: epoch at which this stake was activated, std::Epoch::MAX if is a bootstrap stake

fields.name: deactivation_epoch
docs: epoch the stake was deactivated, std::Epoch::MAX if not deactivated

fields.name: merkle_root
docs: merkle root for this settlement, multiple settlements can be created with the same merkle root,
settlements will be distinguished by the vote_account

fields.name: max_total_claim
docs: maximal number of lamports that can be claimed from this settlement

fields.name: max_merkle_nodes
docs: maximal number of merkle tree nodes that can be claimed from this settlement

fields.name: rent_collector
docs: collects the rent exempt from the settlement account when closed

fields.name: epoch
docs: epoch that the settlement is created for

types.name: Settlement
docs: Settlement account for a particular config and merkle root
Settlement defines that a protected event happened and it will be settled

fields.name: bond
docs: the settlement belongs under this bond, i.e., under a particular validator vote account

fields.name: staker_authority
docs: settlement authority used as the 'staker' stake account authority
of stake accounts funded to this settlement

fields.name: merkle_root
docs: 256-bit merkle root to check the claims against

fields.name: max_total_claim
docs: maximum number of funds that can ever be claimed

fields.name: max_merkle_nodes
docs: maximum number of merkle tree nodes that can ever be claimed

fields.name: lamports_funded
docs: total lamports funded

fields.name: lamports_claimed
docs: total lamports that have been claimed

fields.name: merkle_nodes_claimed
docs: number of nodes that have been claimed

fields.name: epoch_created_for
docs: what epoch the Settlement has been created for

fields.name: slot_created_at
docs: when the Settlement was created

fields.name: rent_collector
docs: address that collects the rent exempt from the Settlement account when closed

fields.name: split_rent_collector
docs: address that collects rent exempt for "split stake account" possibly created on funding settlement

fields.name: split_rent_amount
docs: amount of lamports that are collected for rent exempt for "split stake account"

fields.name: bumps
docs: PDA bumps

fields.name: reserved
docs: reserve space for future extensions

types.name: SettlementClaim
docs: The settlement claim serves for deduplication purposes,
preventing the same settlement from being claimed multiple times with the same claiming data

fields.name: settlement
docs: settlement account this claim belongs under

fields.name: stake_account_to
docs: stake account to which the claim has been withdrawn to

fields.name: stake_account_staker
docs: staker authority as part of the merkle proof for this claim

fields.name: stake_account_withdrawer
docs: withdrawer authority as part of the merkle proof for this claim

fields.name: amount
docs: claim amount

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA account bump, one claim per settlement

fields.name: rent_collector
docs: rent collector account to get the rent back for claim account creation

fields.name: reserved
docs: reserve space for future extensions

types.name: SettlementClaims
docs: Account serving to deduplicate claiming, consists of anchor data as metadata header and bitmap in the remaining space.

types.name: WithdrawRequest
docs: Request from a validator to withdraw the bond

fields.name: vote_account
docs: Validator vote account that requested the withdrawal

fields.name: bond
docs: Bond account that the withdraw request is for (has to match with vote_account)

fields.name: epoch
docs: Epoch when the withdrawal was requested, i.e., when this "ticket" is created

fields.name: requested_amount
docs: Amount of lamports to withdraw

fields.name: withdrawn_amount
docs: Amount of lamports withdrawn so far

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA account bump

fields.name: reserved
docs: reserve space for future extensions
